name: Curse Burst
description:
Play as Ben Dover, the only man brave enough to swear in a polite world!

Use the power of harsh language to blast away the unsuspecting citizens as they go about their day- but beware of the polite police. 

Try for the highest score!

Credits:

Art:

Lucy Gold

Music:

Bram Johnson

Code:

Sheepdog 

RageForDragons
